title: [1.12.2-1.7.10][In-Game Account Switcher——游戏内账号切换器][BGM][汉化][HAYO]
author: 七海八千代
txt_content:
本帖最后由 七海八千代 于 2020-3-8 18:25 编辑 

BGMhttp://music.163.com/style/swf/widget.swf?sid=477215249&type=2&auto=1&width=320&height=66搬运ModMOD介绍首先呢，这是个很小巧的Mod（最新版本连100KB都不到）
这个Mod的功能也很轻量级，只是可以让你在进入游戏界面切换账号而不需要重新打开而已。
这个Mod的语言有德语（德国）、英语（美国）、西班牙语(传统)、法语(法国)、俄语、简体中文、繁体中文（简体中文和繁体中文非官方，是我汉化的）图文Mod使用说明首先打开MC

打开后点击一半Steve一半Alex的图形，就会打开此Mod的Gui界面，然后你就会看到

之后点击添加账号就会弹出

在用户名处输入你的正版用户名，在密码处输入你的正版密码点添加账号即可（如果是盗版的话直接无视掉密码，在用户名处输入ID后直接点击添加账号即可）
然后之前灰掉的、不能点的按钮也可以点了

“重载皮肤”顾名思义即为重新加载皮肤，添加账号已经介绍过了，就不介绍了，登录(离线模式)即为登陆盗版
删除即为删除ID，取消就是返回游戏界面
编辑的话就是编辑ID，你点后会弹出

更改完后点击编辑账号即可完成更改
登录灰掉的原因是因为我不是正版，所以没有打密码，如果输入了密码的话就可以点了此贴更新记录

2017年8月6日更新了1.11和1.12的Release版本2017年1月12日此贴首次发布
Mod更新记录（未汉化）1.12/1.12.1/1.12.27.0.3:
Updated for Minecraft 1.12 / Forge #23871.11.27.0.3:
Mod now accepts 1.11 and 1.11.27.0.1:
Updated to 1.11.X
1.10.2/1.10/1.9.46.1.1.72:Change offline mode message to make a little more sense to the average userAdded "Reload Skins" button to the Account SelectorAdd Custom Main Menu support.6.0.2.27:1.10.2 update1.10.2/1.10 Liteloader版（未搬运）3.0.1.74:1.10.X update1.10.2/1.107.0.1:Developers will no longer have crashes when going to the dev environment after using a released build, or vise versa.The "Reload Skins" button now reloads the current skin without you having to switch away and back.Pressing F5 now reloads skins.evilmidget38:-All text field operations now work on the username and password fields, with the exception of copying from the password field. This means you can now copy+paste, move the cursor with the arrow keys, select multiple characters with shift, and more.-The character limit on usernames and passwords was increased from 32 to 64.-You can now switch to online from offline mode without having to switch accounts.-The account currently in use now appears green on the account selection screen.1.10.27.0.0:Greatly improved security6.1.2:Updated to the new update json link1.9.4 Liteloader版（未搬运）2.0.1.73:1.9.4 update1.10/1.9.46.0.2.26:Make logo show on the mod information screen again.6.0.2.25:Updated to 1.10. Still works with 1.9.41.9.47.0.1:Greatly improved securityDevelopers will no longer have crashes when going to the dev environment after using a released build, or vise versa.The "Reload Skins" button now reloads the current skin without you having to switch away and back.Pressing F5 now reloads skins.evilmidget38:-All text field operations now work on the username and password fields, with the exception of copying from the password field. This means you can now copy+paste, move the cursor with the arrow keys, select multiple characters with shift, and more.-The character limit on usernames and passwords was increased from 32 to 64.-You can now switch to online from offline mode without having to switch accounts.-The account currently in use now appears green on the account selection screen.6.0.1.24:Bug fixesUpdated to 1.9.41.9 Liteloader版（未搬运）1.1.1.69:Change offline mode message to make a little more sense to the average userAdded "Reload Skins" button to the Account SelectorAdd Custom Main Menu support. 1.0.1.52:LiteLoader edition1.95.0.0.23:Updated to 1.9Account data storage is no longer modpack-specificAdded a config option to toggle whether or not IAS will allow you to relog with the same accountCache skins in the same location as OfflineSkins, to prevent duplicatesSwitch to Forge's lightweight json update checking systemUpdated logoMuch cleanupPerformance improvementsImproved debug logs; bug fixes should now be easier1.8.9/1.87.0.1:Change offline mode message to make a little more sense to the average userAdded "Reload Skins" button to the Account SelectorPressing F5 now reloads skinsAdded Custom Main Menu supportGreatly improved securityevilmidget38:-All text field operations now work on the username and password fields, with the exception of copying from the password field. This means you can now copy+paste, move the cursor with the arrow keys, select multiple characters with shift, and more.-The character limit on usernames and passwords was increased from 32 to 64.-You can now switch to online from offline mode without having to switch accounts.-The account currently in use now appears green on the account selection screen.6.0.3.27:This is a backport of In-Game Account Switcher 6.0.3.27 to Minecraft 1.8.X.1.82.2.6.0:Updated German translation2.2.5.0:Adjustment for Unified Mode to work correctly2.2.4.0:Tweaks for Unified Mode to work2.2.3.0:Fixed a rare crash on spotty internetMinor internal changes2.2.2.0:Bug fixes2.2.1.0:Added the ability to search the account listAdded an edit buttonAdded a preview of the account's skinAdded details about if the account is premium, how many times you have switched to the account, and when you last switched to the accountFixed some crashesMajor internal improvements2.1.2.0:Update Checker improvements(Link is now clickable!)2.1.1.0:No changelog provided.1.7.107.0.1:Greatly improved securityThe "Reload Skins" button now reloads the current skin without you having to switch away and back.Pressing F5 now reloads skins.evilmidget38:-All text field operations now work on the username and password fields, with the exception of copying from the password field. This means you can now copy+paste, move the cursor with the arrow keys, select multiple characters with shift, and more.-The character limit on usernames and passwords was increased from 32 to 64.-You can now switch to online from offline mode without having to switch accounts.-The account currently in use now appears green on the account selection screen.6.1.1.72:This is a backport of In-Game Account Switcher 6.1.1.72 to Minecraft 1.7.10.2.2.2.0:Note: This is a backport version, it does not have a built in version checker.Bug fixes下载地址对应版本号推荐Mod版本最新Mod版本1.12.27.0.57.0.51.12.17.0.37.0.31.127.0.37.0.31.11.27.0.37.0.31.117.0.37.0.31.10.27.017.0.11.107.0.17.0.11.9.47.0.17.0.11.9无推荐版本5.0.0.231.8.97.0.17.0.11.87.0.17.0.11.7.107.0.17.0.1汉化文本汉化文本下载链接： http://pan.baidu.com/s/1c15M3gG
密码: 灵M
PS：zh_CN.lang代表简体中文，zh_TW.lang代表正體中文。
另外，不保证汉化文本中一些词汇的准确性，如果有错误请及时提出搬运工的废话如果你愿意帮助推广本mod的话，可以将下面的代码加入你的签名档
[url=http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-661131-1-1.html][img]http://i.imgur.com/T99KcN5.png[/img][/url]复制代码效果：
-The End-[groupid=128]HAYO Studio[/groupid]

replies.author: la_you
replies.txt_content:
楼主还在吗？1.12.2版本已经更新到7.0.5了！
实际上是我与原作者取得联系，然后提供了自己的汉化文件，原作者重新打包了模组，现在有官方汉化了
不过这个“官方汉化”仅限于1.12.2，其他版本都还得手动汉化
